hackathon-description-text: Take what you love, fuse it with tech, build something the world has never seen.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Android Engineer / Twitter; Co-Founder / Startup Shell
Venture Partner, Disruption Corporation and Crystal Tech Fund

hackathon-requirements: Your submission must combine one of your personal interests with technology. The rest is left as an excercise to the hacker.
hackathon-rules:
Don’t use an old project, start something new instead! Obviously, alcohol, drugs, firearms, knives, weapons (including toys) are stricly forbidden. Read through our 
 for more details.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: As judged by VP John Fontaine.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack Built Using the SocialRadar API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Free trip to Redmond, WA headquarters to the winner of this challenge (to take place in Fall or Winter of 2014 on a mutually agreed date).
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack Built With Microsoft Products

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Sphero Robot Ball (game system for iOS and Android) for up to four team members!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Booz Allen Hamilton's Best Big Data Hack using D3

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 2-years Rdio Unlimited for each member of the winning team.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of the Rdio API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: USB-connector Nintendo 64 controllers for PC, one for every member of the winning team.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Project Built Using Twilio Voice or Messaging

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 bag JAVAZEN plus $10 off coupon (per person).
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Daocloud's Most Impactful Mobile Health App

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A Goal Zero Switch Eight Solar Charger + Mobile Battery Pack for each team member. Keep charged while on the go or camping.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: The Best Hack Built With The SendGrid API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $200 AmEx Gift card to the winning team
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most creative use of the Clarabridge API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 BTC (bitcoin) per team + Chance to intern with CEO
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: BookHolder's Best App/Program Using Internet-Sourced Data

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Free RPi or OpenWRT device for each team member + Chance to intern with CEO

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: up to 4 DKHDs - 1 for each member of the winning team
